author: mcombellack
msg: Issue: NullPointerException will be thrown in the destory methods if the domains fail to initialise because the destroy method attempts to close the domain but the domain is null.
Fix: Added check for null before attempting to close the domain

author: mcombellack
msg: Removed stray commented out @Ignore(TUSCANY-2939) on a test as TUSCANY-2939 is fixed and the test runs without issue
